page.title: 12DURSLEY SPORTS CENTRE
page.content: {1. When did the Sports Centre open?} A. 1973, 12 years ago. {2. What are the most popular sports?} A. 1.Badminton 2.Squash 3.Keep fit, weight training, aerobics. {3. Is there any other sports facility {that people want? A. Yes, a swimming pool. It can be used for swimming lessons, safety training, canoeing and sailing. {4. What age groups use the sports {centre for recreation? A. 7-11 years 60 children a day in holidays. 12-18 years 1300 pupils at Rednock School. 19+ years in evenings and weekends. {5. What sports facilities are there?} A. Tennis courts, five aside football and basketball, floodlit netball, hockey, squash courts each costing Â£30,000. Hall for various activities.
